query: CREATE TABLE bmscantest (a int, b int, t text)
expected: CREATE TABLE bmscantest (a INT, b INT, t TEXT)

query: INSERT INTO bmscantest SELECT (r%53), (r%59), 'foooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo' FROM generate_series(1,70000) r
expected: INSERT INTO bmscantest SELECT (r % 53), (r % 59), 'foooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo' FROM generate_series(1, 70000) AS r
CREATE INDEX i_bmtest_a ON bmscantest USING btree ( a )
CREATE INDEX i_bmtest_b ON bmscantest USING btree ( b )

query: SELECT count(*) FROM bmscantest WHERE a = 1 AND b = 1
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bmscantest WHERE a = 1 AND b = 1

query: SELECT count(*) FROM bmscantest WHERE a = 1 OR b = 1
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bmscantest WHERE a = 1 OR b = 1
